structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text:
The council, after consultation with the center, shall promulgate administrative regulations pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A providing for:
The establishment, operation, eligibility for services, cost reimbursement, fees for services, maintenance, and government control of the center established pursuant to KRS 164.981 to 164.9819;
Standards necessary for cooperation under and compliance with any federal law with respect to grants-in-aid for client training or facilities; and
Any other administrative regulations as may be necessary to implement KRS 164.981 to 164.9819.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1996.
